img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a horse-like creature on a wooden bridge surrounded by a forest. The player character is seen from behind, holding a weapon, and facing the creature. The creature appears to be mid-attack, with sparks visible around it. The game interface displays various icons and bars, including health and stamina indicators at the bottom left, and action or ability icons on the left and right sides of the screen. The setting is atmospheric, with dense trees and foliage visible in the background.
